name: 王鴻祥
objective: 深耕趨勢學理論，以生活型態資訊為基礎，探討社會趨勢與科技發展趨勢，做為商品企畫的基礎。本課程旨在引導學習者運用學術研究的工具，以科學的方法定義市場需求，並以理性的思維進行商品企畫。
schedule:
01. Introduction and grouping
02. WORKSHOP- Smart processes for planning product-service systems
03. PHASE 1- User and customer research
04. PHASE 2- Cost analysis
05. PHASE 3- Concept generation
06. PHASE 4- Prototype Testing
09. Deadline for handing in project report.
scorePolicy:
70% Workshops (processes & products) and class participation
30% Final report
